title: Harvard Is NOT For Academic Freedom
description:
Following her controversial remarks at a congressional hearing on anti-Semitism on college campuses, Harvard president Claudine Gay is under fire yet again due to several plagiarism allegations. Harvard's governing body seems to be giving her support, which continues to show that Harvard is no longer for academic freedom.
